content: दिष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [दिश् भावे क्तिन्, संज्ञायां कर्तरि क्तिच् वा] {@--1@} Assignment, allotment. {@--2@} Direction, command, instruction, rule, precept. {@--3@} Fate, fortune, destiny. {@--4@} Good fortune, happiness, any auspicious event (such as the birth of a son); दिष्टिवृद्धिमिव शुश्राव <ls>K. 55</ls>; दिष्टिवृद्धिसंभ्रमो महानभूत् <ls>K. 70.</ls> {@--5@} A sort of measure of length.
